payload.name: network-topology-shapes-bisection-bandwidth-partition-to-minimize-chatter
payload.title: Network topology shapes bisection bandwidth; partition to minimize chatter
payload.formal: cost of communication depends on graph cut size; minimize edge cut for task graph.
payload.apm2_mapping: treat the **work DAG** as a graph partitioning problem: co-locate tightly-coupled work items (shared context packs, shared artifacts) and isolate weakly coupled ones. This reduces both bandwidth and *attack surface* (bulkheads).
